name: Limousine Drive in Snow
description:
Do you ever think of driving super luxury limo car on off-road tracks of hilly areas covered with snow in snow falling? YES!!! Then you must download Limousine Drive in Snow game to full fill your dreams in no time.
You may have already played many driving and parking simulation games but you never had played luxury limo driving game in difficult offroad tracks of hill stations in snow falling when all hills and roads are covered with white snow. Your duty is to pick up the passengers and take them to the hilly areas where tourists come from different parts of the world to enjoy .
